game.name: Trailmarks
game.shortDescription: You're the new fact-checker for the Trailmarks Travel Guide. Your job: Answer trivia, verify facts and circumnavigate the globe before time and money run out. Travel by boat, bus, train, or flight. Trade exotic souvenirs. Impress your handlers. Keep your spirits up and try not to get stranded.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You're the new fact-checker for the Trailmarks Travel Guide. Your job: Answer trivia, verify facts and circumnavigate the globe before time and money run out. Travel by boat, bus, train, or flight. Trade exotic souvenirs. Impress your handlers. Keep your spirits up and try not to get stranded.
